<h2>Select Better Model Based on Fit</h2>

<h3>Description</h3>

<p>Compares two models and selects the one with better fit based on Tjur's R2.
</p>


<h3>Usage</h3>

<pre><code class='language-R'>get_better_model_based_on_fit(list_models)
</code></pre>


<h3>Arguments</h3>

<table>
<tr><td><code id="list_models">list_models</code></td>
<td>
<p>A list of two fitted model objects.</p>
</td></tr>
</table>


<h3>Value</h3>

<p>The model object with better fit.
</p>

</main>
